when i tried to avoid the DB input i get wired exception(ame code with db input works):

erminate called after throwing an instance of 'caffe2::EnforceNotMet'
what(): [enforce fail at net.cc:61] . op LabelCrossEntropy: Source for input label is unknown for net train_predict, operator input: "prob" input: "label" output: "xent" type: "LabelCrossEntropy"

it's happened before i set the "data" and labels "blob" at CreateNet
